00219 BOOLEAN AddSoldierToHelicopter( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00220 {
00221       // attempt to add soldier to helicopter
00222       if( iHelicopterVehicleId == -1 )
00223       {
00224             // no heli yet
00225             return( FALSE );
00226       }
00227 
00228       // check if heli is in motion or if on the ground
00229       if( ( fHelicopterIsAirBorne == TRUE ) && (fHoveringHelicopter == FALSE ) )
00230       {
00231             return( FALSE );
00232       }
00233 
00234       // is the heli returning to base?..he ain't waiting if so
00235       if( fHeliReturnStraightToBase == TRUE )
00236       {
00237             return( FALSE );
00238       }
00239 
00240 
00241       // attempt to add to vehicle
00242       return( PutSoldierInVehicle( pSoldier, ( INT8 )iHelicopterVehicleId ) );
00243 }

00246 BOOLEAN RemoveSoldierFromHelicopter( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00247 {
00248       // attempt to add soldier to helicopter
00249       if( iHelicopterVehicleId == -1 )
00250       {
00251             // no heli yet
00252             return( FALSE );
00253       }
00254 
00255       // check if heli is in motion or if on the ground
00256       if( ( fHelicopterIsAirBorne == TRUE ) && (fHoveringHelicopter == FALSE ) )
00257       {
00258             return( FALSE );
00259       }
00260 
00261       // is the heli returning to base?..he ain't waiting if so
00262       if( fHeliReturnStraightToBase == TRUE )
00263       {
00264             return( FALSE );
00265       }
00266 
00267       pSoldier -> sSectorX = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX;
00268       pSoldier -> sSectorY = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY;
00269       pSoldier -> bSectorZ = 0;
00270 
00271       // reset between sectors
00272       pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
00273 
00274 
00275       // remove from the vehicle
00276       return( TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier ) );
00277 }

00280 
00281 BOOLEAN HandleHeliEnteringSector( INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00282 {
00283       UINT8 ubNumEnemies;
00284 
00285       
00286       // check for SAM attack upon the chopper.  If it's destroyed by the attack, do nothing else here
00287       if( HandleSAMSiteAttackOfHelicopterInSector( sX, sY ) == TRUE )
00288       {
00289             // destroyed
00290             return( TRUE );
00291       }
00292 
00293 
00294       // count how many enemies are camped there or passing through
00295       ubNumEnemies = NumEnemiesInSector( sX, sY );
00296 
00297       // any baddies?
00298       if( ubNumEnemies > 0 )
00299       {
00300             // if the player didn't know about these prior to the chopper's arrival
00301             if( WhatPlayerKnowsAboutEnemiesInSector( sX, sY ) == KNOWS_NOTHING )
00302             {
00303                   // but Skyrider notices them
00304                   if ( DoesSkyriderNoticeEnemiesInSector( ubNumEnemies ) == TRUE )
00305                   {
00306                         // if just passing through (different quotes are used below if it's his final destination)
00307                         if( !EndOfHelicoptersPath( ) )
00308                         {
00309                               // stop time compression and inform player that there are enemies in the sector below
00310                               StopTimeCompression();
00311 
00312                               if( Random( 2 ) )
00313                               {
00314                                     HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, ENEMIES_SPOTTED_EN_ROUTE_IN_FRIENDLY_SECTOR_A );
00315                               }
00316                               else
00317                               {
00318                                     HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, ENEMIES_SPOTTED_EN_ROUTE_IN_FRIENDLY_SECTOR_B );
00319                               }
00320                         }
00321 
00322                         // make their presence appear on the map while Skyrider remains in the sector
00323                         SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sX, sY ) ].uiFlags |= SF_SKYRIDER_NOTICED_ENEMIES_HERE;
00324                   }
00325             }
00326       }
00327 
00328 
00329       // player pays for travel if Skyrider is NOT returning to base (even if empty while scouting/going for pickup)
00330       if ( fHeliReturnStraightToBase == FALSE )
00331       {
00332             // charge cost for flying another sector
00333             iTotalAccumulatedCostByPlayer += GetCostOfPassageForHelicopter( sX, sY );
00334       }
00335 
00336       // accumulate distance travelled
00337 //    AddSectorToHelicopterDistanceTravelled( );
00338 
00339 
00340       // check if heli has any real path left
00341       if( EndOfHelicoptersPath( ) )
00342       {
00343             // start hovering
00344             StartHoverTime( );
00345 
00346             // if sector is safe, or Skyrider MUST land anyway (returning to base)
00347             if ( ( ubNumEnemies == 0 ) || fHeliReturnStraightToBase )
00348             {
00349                   // if he has passengers, or he's not going straight to base, tell player he's arrived
00350                   // (i.e. don't say anything nor stop time compression if he's empty and just returning to base)
00351                   if ( ( GetNumberOfPassengersInHelicopter() > 0 ) || !fHeliReturnStraightToBase )
00352                   {
00353                         // arrived at destination
00354                         HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, ARRIVED_IN_NON_HOSTILE_SECTOR );
00355                         StopTimeCompression();
00356                   }
00357 
00358                   // destination reached, payment due.  If player can't pay, mercs get kicked off and heli flies to base!
00359                   PaySkyriderBill();
00360             }
00361             else
00362             {
00363                   // Say quote: "Gonna have to abort.  Enemies below"
00364                   HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, ARRIVED_IN_HOSTILE_SECTOR );
00365                   StopTimeCompression();
00366             }
00367 
00368             if( CheckForArrivalAtRefuelPoint( ) )
00369             {
00370                   ReFuelHelicopter( );
00371             }
00372       }
00373 
00374       return( FALSE );
00375 }

00407 INT32 LocationOfNearestRefuelPoint( BOOLEAN fNotifyPlayerIfNoSafeLZ )
00408 {
00409       INT32 iClosestLocation = -1;
00410 
00411       // try to find one, any one under the players control
00412       iClosestLocation = FindLocationOfClosestRefuelSite( TRUE );
00413 
00414       // no go?...then find 
00415       if( iClosestLocation == -1 )
00416       {
00417             if( fNotifyPlayerIfNoSafeLZ )
00418             {
00419                   // no refueling sites available, might wanna warn player about this
00420                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, pHelicopterEtaStrings[ 5 ] );
00421             }
00422 
00423             // find the closest location regardless
00424             iClosestLocation = FindLocationOfClosestRefuelSite( FALSE );
00425       }
00426 
00427       // always returns a valid refuel point, picking a hostile one if unavoidable
00428       Assert( iClosestLocation != -1 );
00429 
00430       return( iClosestLocation );
00431 }
00432  
00433 INT32 FindLocationOfClosestRefuelSite( BOOLEAN fMustBeAvailable )
00434 {
00435       INT32 iShortestDistance = 9999;
00436       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00437       INT32 iDistance = 9999;
00438       INT32 iClosestLocation = -1;
00439 
00440       // find shortest distance to refuel site
00441       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_REFUEL_SITES; iCounter++ )
00442       {
00443             // if this refuelling site is available
00444             if( ( fRefuelingSiteAvailable[ iCounter ] ) || ( fMustBeAvailable == FALSE ) )
00445             {
00446                   // find if sector is under control, find distance from heli to it
00447                   iDistance = ( INT32 )FindStratPath( ( INT16 )( CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX , pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY ) ), ( INT16 )( CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( ubRefuelList[ iCounter ][ 0 ], ubRefuelList[ iCounter ][ 1 ] ) ) , pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup, FALSE );
00448 
00449                   if( iDistance < iShortestDistance )
00450                   {
00451                         // shorter, copy over
00452                         iShortestDistance = iDistance;
00453                         iClosestLocation = iCounter;
00454                   }
00455             }
00456       }
00457 
00458       // return the location
00459       return( iClosestLocation );
00460 }
00461 
00462 
00463 INT32 DistanceToNearestRefuelPoint( INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00464 {
00465       INT32 iClosestLocation;
00466       INT32 iDistance;
00467 
00468       // don't notify player during these checks!
00469       iClosestLocation = LocationOfNearestRefuelPoint( FALSE );
00470 
00471       iDistance = ( INT32 )FindStratPath( ( INT16 )( CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sX, sY ) ), ( INT16 )( CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( ubRefuelList[ iClosestLocation ][ 0 ], ubRefuelList[ iClosestLocation ][ 1 ] ) ) , pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup, FALSE );
00472       return( iDistance );
00473 }

00509 
00510 INT32 GetCostOfPassageForHelicopter( INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00511 {
00512       // check if sector is air controlled or not, if so, then normal cost, otherwise increase the cost
00513       INT32 iCost = 0;
00514 
00515       // if they don't control it
00516       if( StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sX, sY ) ].fEnemyAirControlled == FALSE )
00517       {
00518             iCost = COST_AIRSPACE_SAFE;
00519       }
00520       else
00521       {
00522             iCost = COST_AIRSPACE_UNSAFE;
00523       }
00524 
00525       return( iCost );
00526 }

00529 void SkyriderDestroyed( void )
00530 {
00531       // remove any arrival events for the helicopter's group
00532       DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup );
00533 
00534       // kill eveyone on board
00535       KillAllInVehicle( iHelicopterVehicleId );
00536 
00537       // kill skyrider
00538       fSkyRiderAvailable = FALSE;
00539       SoldierSkyRider.bLife = 0;
00540       gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].bLife = 0;
00541 
00542       // heli no longer available
00543       fHelicopterAvailable = FALSE;
00544 
00545       // destroy helicopter
00546       fHelicopterDestroyed = TRUE;
00547 
00548       // zero out balance due
00549       gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].iBalance = 0;
00550 //    iTotalHeliDistanceSinceRefuel = 0;
00551       iTotalAccumulatedCostByPlayer = 0;
00552 
00553       // remove vehicle and reset
00554       RemoveVehicleFromList( iHelicopterVehicleId );
00555       iHelicopterVehicleId = -1;
00556 
00557       return;
00558 }

00560 
00561 BOOLEAN CanHelicopterFly( void )
00562 {
00563       // check if heli is available for flight?
00564 
00565       // is the heli available
00566       if( fHelicopterAvailable == FALSE )
00567       {
00568             return( FALSE );
00569       }
00570 
00571       if( VehicleIdIsValid( iHelicopterVehicleId ) == FALSE )
00572       {
00573             return( FALSE );
00574       }
00575 
00576 /*
00577       // travelled too far?
00578       if( iTotalHeliDistanceSinceRefuel > MAX_HELICOPTER_DISTANCE )
00579       {
00580             return( FALSE );
00581       }
00582 */
00583 
00584       // is the pilot alive, well, and willing to help us?
00585       if( IsHelicopterPilotAvailable( ) == FALSE )
00586       {
00587             return( FALSE );
00588       }
00589 
00590       if( fHeliReturnStraightToBase == TRUE )
00591       {
00592             return ( FALSE );
00593       }
00594 
00595       // grounded by enemies in sector?
00596       if ( CanHelicopterTakeOff() == FALSE )
00597       {
00598             return ( FALSE );
00599       }
00600 
00601       // everything A-OK!
00602       return( TRUE );
00603 }
00604 
00605 BOOLEAN IsHelicopterPilotAvailable( void )
00606 {
00607       // what is state of skyrider?
00608       if( fSkyRiderAvailable == FALSE )
00609       {
00610             return( FALSE );
00611       }
00612 
00613       // owe any money to skyrider?
00614       if( gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].iBalance < 0 )
00615       {
00616             return( FALSE );
00617       }
00618 
00619       // Drassen too disloyal to wanna help player?
00620       if ( CheckFact( FACT_LOYALTY_LOW, SKYRIDER ) )
00621       {
00622             return ( FALSE );
00623       }
00624 
00625       return( TRUE );
00626 }

00628 
00629 void LandHelicopter( void )
00630 {
00631       // set the helictoper down, call arrive callback for this mvt group
00632       fHelicopterIsAirBorne = FALSE;
00633       
00634       // no longer hovering
00635       fHoveringHelicopter = FALSE;
00636 
00637       // reset fact that we might have returned straight here
00638       fHeliReturnStraightToBase = FALSE;
00639 
00640       HandleHelicopterOnGroundGraphic( );
00641       HandleHelicopterOnGroundSkyriderProfile( );
00642 
00643       // if we'll be unable to take off again (because there are enemies in the sector, or we owe pilot money)
00644       if ( CanHelicopterFly() == FALSE )
00645       {
00646             // kick everyone out!
00647             MoveAllInHelicopterToFootMovementGroup( );
00648       }
00649       else
00650       {
00651             // play meanwhile scene if it hasn't been used yet
00652             HandleKillChopperMeanwhileScene();
00653       }
00654 }

00657 void TakeOffHelicopter( void )
00658 {
00659       // heli in the air
00660       fHelicopterIsAirBorne = TRUE;
00661 
00662       // no longer hovering
00663       fHoveringHelicopter = FALSE;
00664 
00665       HandleHelicopterOnGroundGraphic( );
00666       HandleHelicopterOnGroundSkyriderProfile( );
00667 }

00670 
00671 void StartHoverTime( void )
00672 {
00673       // start hover in this sector
00674       fHoveringHelicopter = TRUE;
00675 
00676       // post event for x mins in future, save start time, if event time - delay = start time, then hover has gone on too long
00677       uiStartHoverTime = GetWorldTotalMin( );
00678 
00679       // post event..to call handle hover
00680       AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_HELICOPTER_HOVER_TOO_LONG, GetWorldTotalMin() + TIME_DELAY_FOR_HOVER_WAIT, 0 );
00681 
00682       return;
00683 }
00684 
00685 void HandleHeliHoverLong( void )
00686 {
00687       // post message about hovering too long
00688       if( fHoveringHelicopter )
00689       {
00690             // proper event, post next one
00691             AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_HELICOPTER_HOVER_WAY_TOO_LONG, uiStartHoverTime + TIME_DELAY_FOR_HOVER_WAIT_TOO_LONG, 0 );
00692 
00693             // inform player
00694             HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, HOVERING_A_WHILE );
00695 
00696             // stop time compression if it's on
00697             StopTimeCompression( );
00698       }
00699       else
00700       {
00701             // reset 
00702             uiStartHoverTime = 0;
00703       }
00704 }
00705 
00706 
00707 void HandleHeliHoverTooLong( void )
00708 {
00709       // reset hover time
00710       uiStartHoverTime = 0;
00711 
00712       if( fHoveringHelicopter == FALSE )
00713       {
00714             return;
00715       }
00716 
00717       
00718       // hovered too long, inform player heli is returning to base
00719       HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, RETURN_TO_BASE );
00720 
00721       // If the sector is safe
00722       if ( NumEnemiesInSector( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX, pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY ) == 0 )
00723       {
00724             // kick everyone out!
00725             MoveAllInHelicopterToFootMovementGroup( );
00726       }
00727 
00728       MakeHeliReturnToBase();
00729 }
00730 
00731 
00732 // check if anyone in the chopper sees any baddies in sector
00733 BOOLEAN DoesSkyriderNoticeEnemiesInSector( UINT8 ubNumEnemies )
00734 {
00735       UINT8 ubChance;
00736 
00737       // is the pilot and heli around?
00738       if( CanHelicopterFly( ) == FALSE )
00739       {
00740             return( FALSE );
00741       }
00742 
00743       // if there aren't any, he obviously won't see them
00744       if( ubNumEnemies == 0 )
00745       {
00746             return( FALSE );
00747       }
00748 
00749       // figure out what the chance is of seeing them
00750       // make this relatively accurate most of the time, to encourage helicopter scouting by making it useful
00751       ubChance = 60 + ubNumEnemies;
00752 
00753       if( PreRandom( 100 ) < ubChance )
00754       {
00755             return( TRUE );
00756       }
00757 
00758       return( FALSE );
00759 }
00760 
00761 
00762 // if the heli is on the move, what is the distance it will move..the length of the merc path, less the first node
00763 INT32 DistanceOfIntendedHelicopterPath( void )
00764 {
00765       PathStPtr pNode = NULL;
00766       INT32 iLength = 0;
00767 
00768       if( CanHelicopterFly( ) == FALSE )
00769       {
00770             // big number, no go
00771             return( 9999 );
00772       }
00773 
00774       pNode = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath;
00775       
00776       // any path yet?
00777       if( pNode != NULL )
00778       {
00779             while( pNode -> pNext )
00780             {
00781                   iLength++;
00782                   pNode = pNode ->pNext;
00783             }
00784       }
00785 
00786       pNode = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( pTempHelicopterPath );
00787 
00788       // any path yet?
00789       if( pNode != NULL )
00790       {
00791             while( pNode -> pNext )
00792             {
00793                   iLength++;
00794                   pNode = pNode ->pNext;
00795             }
00796       }
00797 
00798       return( iLength );
00799 }
00800 
00801 
00802 
00803 BOOLEAN CheckForArrivalAtRefuelPoint( void )
00804 {
00805       // check if this is our final destination
00806       if ( GetLengthOfPath( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath ) > 0 )
00807       {
00808             return( FALSE );
00809       }
00810 
00811       // check if we're at a refuel site
00812       if( DistanceToNearestRefuelPoint( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX, pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY ) > 0 )
00813       {
00814             // not at a refuel point
00815             return( FALSE );
00816       }
00817 
00818       // we are at a refuel site
00819       return( TRUE );
00820 }
00821 
00822 
00823 
00824 void SetUpHelicopterForMovement( void )
00825 {
00826       // check if helicopter vehicle has a mvt group, if not, assign one in this sector
00827       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00828 
00829       // if no group, create one for vehicle
00830       if( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup == 0 )
00831       {
00832             // get the vehicle a mvt group
00833             pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup = CreateNewVehicleGroupDepartingFromSector( ( UINT8 )( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX ), ( UINT8 )( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY ), iHelicopterVehicleId );
00834 
00835             // add everyone in vehicle to this mvt group
00836             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
00837             {
00838                   if( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] != NULL )
00839                   {
00840                         // add character
00841                         AddPlayerToGroup( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup, pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ] );
00842                   }
00843             }
00844       }
00845 }
00846

00848 BOOLEAN HeliCharacterDialogue( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usQuoteNum )
00849 {
00850       // ARM: we could just return, but since various flags are often being set it's safer to honk so it gets fixed right!
00851       Assert( fSkyRiderAvailable );
00852 
00853       return( CharacterDialogue( SKYRIDER, usQuoteNum, uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ], DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI, FALSE, FALSE ) );
00854 }

00860 
00861       if( iHelicopterVehicleId != -1 )
00862       {
00863             iNumber = GetNumberInVehicle( iHelicopterVehicleId );
00864       }
00865 
00866       return( iNumber );

00868 
00869 
00870 BOOLEAN IsRefuelSiteInSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
00871 {
00872       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00873 
00874       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_REFUEL_SITES; iCounter++ )
00875       {
00876             if ( ( ubRefuelList[ iCounter ][ 0 ] == sMapX ) && ( ubRefuelList[ iCounter ][ 1 ] == sMapY ) )
00877             {
00878                   return(TRUE);
00879             }
00880       }
00881 
00882       return(FALSE);
00883 }
00884 
00885 
00886 void UpdateRefuelSiteAvailability( void )
00887 {
00888       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00889 
00890       // Generally, only Drassen is initially available for refuelling
00891       // Estoni must first be captured (although player may already have it when he gets Skyrider!)
00892 
00893       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_OF_REFUEL_SITES; iCounter++ )
00894       {
00895             // if enemy controlled sector (ground OR air, don't want to fly into enemy air territory)
00896             if( ( StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( ubRefuelList[ iCounter ][ 0 ], ubRefuelList[ iCounter ][ 1 ] ) ].fEnemyControlled == TRUE ) ||
00897                         ( StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( ubRefuelList[ iCounter ][ 0 ], ubRefuelList[ iCounter ][ 1 ] ) ].fEnemyAirControlled == TRUE ) ||
00898                         ( ( iCounter == ESTONI_REFUELING_SITE ) && ( CheckFact( FACT_ESTONI_REFUELLING_POSSIBLE, 0 ) == FALSE ) ) )
00899             {
00900                   // mark refueling site as unavailable
00901                   fRefuelingSiteAvailable[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
00902             }
00903             else
00904             {
00905                   // mark refueling site as available
00906                   fRefuelingSiteAvailable[ iCounter ] = TRUE;
00907 
00908                   // reactivate a grounded helicopter, if here
00909                   if ( !fHelicopterAvailable && !fHelicopterDestroyed && fSkyRiderAvailable && ( iHelicopterVehicleId != -1 ) )
00910                   {
00911                         if( ( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX == ubRefuelList[ iCounter ][ 0 ]) &&
00912                                 ( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY == ubRefuelList[ iCounter ][ 1 ]) )
00913                         {
00914                               // no longer grounded
00915                               DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( pSkyriderText[ 5 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00916                         }
00917                   }
00918             }
00919       }
00920 }
00921 
00922 
00923 void SetUpHelicopterForPlayer( INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00924 {
00925       if( fSkyRiderSetUp == FALSE )
00926       {
00927             fHelicopterAvailable = TRUE;
00928             fSkyRiderAvailable = TRUE;
00929 
00930             iHelicopterVehicleId = AddVehicleToList( sX, sY, 0, HELICOPTER );
00931 
00932             Assert( iHelicopterVehicleId != -1 );
00933 
00934             memset( &SoldierSkyRider, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00935             SoldierSkyRider.ubProfile = SKYRIDER;
00936             SoldierSkyRider.bLife = 80;
00937 
00938             pSkyRider = &( SoldierSkyRider );
00939             
00940             // set up for movement
00941             SetUpHelicopterForMovement( );
00942             UpdateRefuelSiteAvailability( );
00943 
00944             fSkyRiderSetUp = TRUE;
00945 
00946             gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].fUseProfileInsertionInfo = FALSE;
00947       }
00948       
00949       return;
00950 }
00951 
00952 
00953 UINT8 MoveAllInHelicopterToFootMovementGroup( void )
00954 {
00955       // take everyone out of heli and add to movement group
00956       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00957       UINT8 ubGroupId = 0;
00958       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00959       INT8 bNewSquad;
00960       BOOLEAN fAnyoneAboard = FALSE;
00961       BOOLEAN fSuccess;
00962   UINT8   ubInsertionCode;
00963   BOOLEAN fInsertionCodeSet = FALSE;
00964   UINT16  usInsertionData;
00965 
00966 
00967       // put these guys on their own squad (we need to return their group ID, and can only return one, so they need a unique one
00968       bNewSquad = GetFirstEmptySquad();
00969       if ( bNewSquad == -1 )
00970       {
00971             return( 0 );
00972       }
00973 
00974       // go through list of everyone in helicopter
00975       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iSeatingCapacities[ pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubVehicleType ]; iCounter++ )
00976       {
00977             // get passenger
00978             pSoldier = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pPassengers[ iCounter ];
00979 
00980             if( pSoldier != NULL )
00981             {
00982                   // better really be in there!
00983                   Assert ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE );
00984                   Assert ( pSoldier->iVehicleId == iHelicopterVehicleId );
00985 
00986                   fAnyoneAboard = TRUE;
00987 
00988                   fSuccess = RemoveSoldierFromHelicopter( pSoldier );
00989                   Assert( fSuccess );
00990 
00991                   AddCharacterToSquad( pSoldier, bNewSquad );
00992 
00993       // ATE: OK - the ubStrategicInsertionCode is set 'cause groupArrivesInsector has been
00994       // called when buddy is added to a squad. However, the insertion code onlt sets set for
00995       // the first merc, so the rest are going to use whatever they had previously....
00996       if ( !fInsertionCodeSet )
00997       {
00998         ubInsertionCode = pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode;
00999         usInsertionData = pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData;
01000         fInsertionCodeSet = TRUE;
01001       }
01002       else
01003       {
01004         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubInsertionCode;
01005         pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = usInsertionData;
01006       }
01007             }
01008       }
01009 
01010       if ( fAnyoneAboard )
01011       {
01012             ubGroupId = SquadMovementGroups[ bNewSquad ];
01013       }
01014 
01015       return( ubGroupId );
01016 }

01025       fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01026 
01027       return;
01028 }

01030 
01031 void HandleSkyRiderMonologueEvent( UINT32 uiEventCode, UINT32 uiSpecialCode )
01032 {
01033       // will handle the skyrider monologue about where the SAM sites are and what not
01034 
01035       TurnOnAirSpaceMode();
01036 
01037       switch( uiEventCode )
01038       {
01039             case( SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_DRASSEN_SAM_SITE ):
01040                   SetExternMapscreenSpeechPanelXY( DEFAULT_EXTERN_PANEL_X_POS, 117 );
01041                   HandleSkyRiderMonologueAboutDrassenSAMSite( uiSpecialCode );
01042                   break;
01043             case SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_CAMBRIA_HOSPITAL:
01044                   SetExternMapscreenSpeechPanelXY( DEFAULT_EXTERN_PANEL_X_POS, 172 );
01045                   HandleSkyRiderMonologueAboutCambriaHospital( uiSpecialCode );
01046                   break;
01047             case( SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_OTHER_SAM_SITES ):
01048                   SetExternMapscreenSpeechPanelXY( 335, DEFAULT_EXTERN_PANEL_Y_POS );
01049                   HandleSkyRiderMonologueAboutOtherSAMSites( uiSpecialCode );
01050                   break;
01051             case( SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_ESTONI_REFUEL ):
01052                   SetExternMapscreenSpeechPanelXY( DEFAULT_EXTERN_PANEL_X_POS, DEFAULT_EXTERN_PANEL_Y_POS );
01053                   HandleSkyRiderMonologueAboutEstoniRefuel( uiSpecialCode );
01054                   break;
01055       }
01056 
01057       // update time
01058       guiTimeOfLastSkyriderMonologue = GetWorldTotalMin();
01059 }
01060

01062 void HandleSkyRiderMonologueAboutEstoniRefuel( UINT32 uiSpecialCode )
01063 {
01064       // once estoni is free tell player about refueling
01065 
01066       switch( uiSpecialCode )
01067       {
01068             case( 0 ):
01069                   CharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( SKYRIDER, SPIEL_ABOUT_ESTONI_AIRSPACE, uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ] , DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI , FALSE , FALSE , DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SKYRIDERMAPSCREENEVENT ,SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_ESTONI_REFUEL, 1 );
01070                   // if special event data 2 is true, then do dialogue, else this is just a trigger for an event
01071       CharacterDialogue( SKYRIDER, SPIEL_ABOUT_ESTONI_AIRSPACE, uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ], DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI, FALSE, FALSE );
01072 
01073                   CharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( SKYRIDER, SPIEL_ABOUT_ESTONI_AIRSPACE, uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ] , DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI , FALSE , FALSE , DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SKYRIDERMAPSCREENEVENT ,SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_ESTONI_REFUEL, 2 );
01074                   break;
01075 
01076             case( 1 ):
01077                    // highlight Estoni
01078                   fShowEstoniRefuelHighLight = TRUE;
01079                   break;
01080 
01081             case( 2 ):
01082                   fShowEstoniRefuelHighLight = FALSE;
01083                   break;
01084       }
01085       return;
01086 }

01089 void HandleSkyRiderMonologueAboutDrassenSAMSite( UINT32 uiSpecialCode )
01090 {
01091       switch( uiSpecialCode )
01092       {
01093             case( 0 ):
01094                   //gpCurrentTalkingFace = &gFacesData[ uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ] ];
01095                   //gubCurrentTalkingID = SKYRIDER;
01096                   
01097                   // if special event data 2 is true, then do dialogue, else this is just a trigger for an event
01098                   CharacterDialogue( SKYRIDER, MENTION_DRASSEN_SAM_SITE, uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ], DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI, FALSE, FALSE );
01099                   CharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( SKYRIDER, MENTION_DRASSEN_SAM_SITE, uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ], DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI , FALSE , TRUE , DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SKYRIDERMAPSCREENEVENT ,SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_DRASSEN_SAM_SITE, 1 );
01100 
01101                   if( SAMSitesUnderPlayerControl( SAM_2_X, SAM_2_Y ) == FALSE )
01102                   {
01103                         CharacterDialogue( SKYRIDER, SECOND_HALF_OF_MENTION_DRASSEN_SAM_SITE, uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ], DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI, FALSE, FALSE );
01104                   }
01105                   else
01106                   {
01107                         // Ian says don't use the SAM site quote unless player has tried flying already
01108                         if ( CheckFact( FACT_SKYRIDER_USED_IN_MAPSCREEN, SKYRIDER ) )
01109                         {
01110                               CharacterDialogue( SKYRIDER, SAM_SITE_TAKEN, uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ], DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI, FALSE, FALSE );
01111                               gfSkyriderSaidCongratsOnTakingSAM = TRUE;
01112                         }
01113                   }
01114 
01115                   CharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( SKYRIDER, MENTION_DRASSEN_SAM_SITE, uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ], DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI , FALSE , TRUE , DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SKYRIDERMAPSCREENEVENT ,SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_DRASSEN_SAM_SITE, 2 );
01116                   break;
01117 
01118             case( 1 ):
01119                    // highlight Drassen SAM site sector
01120                   fShowDrassenSAMHighLight = TRUE;
01121                   SetSAMSiteAsFound( SAM_SITE_TWO );
01122                   break;
01123 
01124             case( 2 ):
01125                   fShowDrassenSAMHighLight = FALSE;
01126                   break;
01127       }
01128       return;
01129 }

01172                   CharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( SKYRIDER, SPIEL_ABOUT_OTHER_SAM_SITES, uiExternalStaticNPCFaces[ SKYRIDER_EXTERNAL_FACE ] , DIALOGUE_EXTERNAL_NPC_UI , FALSE , FALSE , DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SKYRIDERMAPSCREENEVENT ,SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_OTHER_SAM_SITES, 2 );
01173                   
01174                   break;

01177                   // highlight other SAMs
01178                   fShowOtherSAMHighLight = TRUE;
01179                   // reveal other 3 SAM sites
01180                   SetSAMSiteAsFound( SAM_SITE_ONE );
01181                   SetSAMSiteAsFound( SAM_SITE_THREE );
01182                   SetSAMSiteAsFound( SAM_SITE_FOUR );

01187                   break;
01188       }

01191 
01192 
01193 void CheckAndHandleSkyriderMonologues( void )
01194 {
01195       // wait at least this many days between Skyrider monologues
01196       if ( ( GetWorldTotalMin() - guiTimeOfLastSkyriderMonologue ) >= ( MIN_DAYS_BETWEEN_SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUES * 24 * 60 ) )
01197       {
01198             if( guiHelicopterSkyriderTalkState == 0 )
01199             {
01200                   HandleSkyRiderMonologueEvent( SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_DRASSEN_SAM_SITE, 0 );
01201                   guiHelicopterSkyriderTalkState = 1;
01202             }
01203             else if( guiHelicopterSkyriderTalkState == 1 )
01204             {
01205                   // if enemy still controls the Cambria hospital sector
01206                   if( StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( HOSPITAL_SECTOR_X, HOSPITAL_SECTOR_Y ) ].fEnemyControlled )
01207                   {
01208                         HandleSkyRiderMonologueEvent( SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_CAMBRIA_HOSPITAL, 0 );
01209                   }
01210                   // advance state even if player already has Cambria's hospital sector!!!
01211                   guiHelicopterSkyriderTalkState = 2;
01212             }
01213             else if( guiHelicopterSkyriderTalkState == 2 )
01214             {
01215                   // wait until player has taken over a SAM site before saying this and advancing state
01216                   if ( gfSkyriderSaidCongratsOnTakingSAM )
01217                   {
01218                         HandleSkyRiderMonologueEvent( SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_OTHER_SAM_SITES, 0 );
01219                         guiHelicopterSkyriderTalkState = 3;
01220                   }
01221             }
01222             else if( guiHelicopterSkyriderTalkState == 3 )
01223             {
01224                   // wait until Estoni refuelling site becomes available
01225                   if ( fRefuelingSiteAvailable[ ESTONI_REFUELING_SITE ] )
01226                   {
01227                         HandleSkyRiderMonologueEvent( SKYRIDER_MONOLOGUE_EVENT_ESTONI_REFUEL, 0 );
01228                         guiHelicopterSkyriderTalkState = 4;
01229                   }
01230             }
01231       }
01232 }
01233 
01234 
01235 void HandleAnimationOfSectors( void )
01236 {
01237       BOOLEAN fSkipSpeakersLocator = FALSE;
01238       // these don't need to be saved, they merely turn off the highlights after they stop flashing
01239       static BOOLEAN fOldShowDrassenSAMHighLight = FALSE;
01240       static BOOLEAN fOldShowCambriaHospitalHighLight = FALSE;
01241       static BOOLEAN fOldShowEstoniRefuelHighLight = FALSE;
01242       static BOOLEAN fOldShowOtherSAMHighLight = FALSE;
01243 
01244       // find out which mode we are in and animate for that mode
01245 
01246       // Drassen SAM site
01247       if( fShowDrassenSAMHighLight )
01248       {
01249             fOldShowDrassenSAMHighLight = TRUE;
01250             // Drassen's SAM site is #3
01251             HandleBlitOfSectorLocatorIcon( SAM_2_X, SAM_2_Y, 0, LOCATOR_COLOR_RED );
01252             fSkipSpeakersLocator = TRUE;
01253       }
01254       else if( fOldShowDrassenSAMHighLight )
01255       {
01256             fOldShowDrassenSAMHighLight = FALSE;
01257             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01258       }
01259 
01260       // Cambria hospital
01261       if( fShowCambriaHospitalHighLight )
01262       {
01263             fOldShowCambriaHospitalHighLight = TRUE;
01264             HandleBlitOfSectorLocatorIcon( HOSPITAL_SECTOR_X, HOSPITAL_SECTOR_Y, 0, LOCATOR_COLOR_RED );
01265             fSkipSpeakersLocator = TRUE;
01266       }
01267       else if( fOldShowCambriaHospitalHighLight )
01268       {
01269             fOldShowCambriaHospitalHighLight = FALSE;
01270             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01271       }
01272 
01273       // show other SAM sites
01274       if( fShowOtherSAMHighLight )
01275       {
01276             fOldShowOtherSAMHighLight = TRUE;
01277             HandleBlitOfSectorLocatorIcon( SAM_1_X, SAM_1_Y, 0, LOCATOR_COLOR_RED );
01278             HandleBlitOfSectorLocatorIcon( SAM_3_X, SAM_3_Y, 0, LOCATOR_COLOR_RED );
01279             HandleBlitOfSectorLocatorIcon( SAM_4_X, SAM_4_Y, 0, LOCATOR_COLOR_RED );
01280             fSkipSpeakersLocator = TRUE;
01281       }
01282       else if( fOldShowOtherSAMHighLight )
01283       {
01284             fOldShowOtherSAMHighLight = FALSE;
01285             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01286       }
01287 
01288       // show Estoni site
01289       if( fShowEstoniRefuelHighLight )
01290       {
01291             fOldShowEstoniRefuelHighLight = TRUE;
01292             HandleBlitOfSectorLocatorIcon( ubRefuelList[ ESTONI_REFUELING_SITE ][ 0 ], ubRefuelList[ ESTONI_REFUELING_SITE ][ 1 ], 0, LOCATOR_COLOR_RED );
01293             fSkipSpeakersLocator = TRUE;
01294       }
01295       else if( fOldShowEstoniRefuelHighLight )
01296       {
01297             fOldShowEstoniRefuelHighLight = FALSE;
01298             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01299       }
01300 
01301 
01302       // don't show sector locator over the speaker's sector if he is talking about another sector - it's confusing
01303       if ( !fSkipSpeakersLocator )
01304       {
01305             switch( gubBlitSectorLocatorCode )
01306             {
01307                   case LOCATOR_COLOR_RED:        // normal one used for mines (will now be overriden with yellow)
01308                         HandleBlitOfSectorLocatorIcon( gsSectorLocatorX, gsSectorLocatorY, 0, LOCATOR_COLOR_RED );
01309                         break;
01310                   case LOCATOR_COLOR_YELLOW: // used for all other dialogues
01311                         HandleBlitOfSectorLocatorIcon( gsSectorLocatorX, gsSectorLocatorY, 0, LOCATOR_COLOR_YELLOW );
01312                         break;
01313             }
01314       }
01315 
01316       return;
01317 }
01318 
01319 INT16 LastSectorInHelicoptersPath( void )
01320 {
01321       // get the last sector value in the helictoper's path
01322       PathStPtr pNode = NULL;
01323       UINT32 uiLocation = 0;
01324 
01325       // if the heli is on the move, what is the distance it will move..the length of the merc path, less the first node
01326       if( CanHelicopterFly( ) == FALSE )
01327       {
01328             // big number, no go
01329             return( 0 );
01330       }
01331 
01332       uiLocation = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX + pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY * MAP_WORLD_X;
01333 
01334       pNode = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath;
01335       
01336       // any path yet?
01337       if( pNode != NULL )
01338       {
01339             while( pNode)
01340             {
01341                   uiLocation = pNode -> uiSectorId;
01342 
01343                   pNode = pNode ->pNext;
01344             }
01345       }
01346 
01347       pNode = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( pTempHelicopterPath );
01348       // any path yet?
01349       if( pNode != NULL )
01350       {
01351             while( pNode )
01352             {
01353                   uiLocation = pNode -> uiSectorId;
01354 
01355                   pNode = pNode ->pNext;
01356             }
01357       }
01358 
01359       return( ( INT16 )uiLocation );
01360 }

01529 
01530 void HandleHelicopterOnGroundGraphic( void )
01531 {
01532       UINT8                         ubSite = 0;
01533       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
01534 
01535       // no worries if underground
01536       if (gbWorldSectorZ != 0 )
01537       {
01538             return;
01539       }
01540 
01541       for( ubSite = 0; ubSite < NUMBER_OF_REFUEL_SITES; ubSite++ )
01542       {
01543             // is this refueling site sector the loaded sector ?
01544             if ( ( ubRefuelList[ ubSite ][ 0 ] == gWorldSectorX ) && ( ubRefuelList[ ubSite ][ 1 ] == gWorldSectorY ) )
01545             {
01546                   // YES, so find out if the chopper is landed here
01547                   if ( IsHelicopterOnGroundAtRefuelingSite( ubSite ) ) 
01548                   {
01549                         // Add....
01550                         AddHelicopterToMaps( TRUE, ubSite );
01551                         // ATE: Add skyridder too 
01552                         // ATE: only if hired......
01553                         if ( fHelicopterAvailable     )
01554                         {
01555                               gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].sSectorX = gWorldSectorX;
01556                               gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].sSectorY = gWorldSectorY;
01557                         }
01558                   }
01559                   else
01560                   {
01561                         AddHelicopterToMaps( FALSE, ubSite );
01562                         // ATE: Remove skyridder....
01563                         if ( fHelicopterAvailable     )
01564                         {
01565                               gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].sSectorX = 0;
01566                               gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].sSectorY = 0;
01567 
01568                               // see if we can find him and remove him if so....
01569                               pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( SKYRIDER, FALSE );
01570 
01571           // ATE: Don't do this if buddy is on our team!
01572                               if ( pSoldier != NULL && pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01573                               {
01574                                     TacticalRemoveSoldier( pSoldier->ubID );                          
01575                               }
01576                         }
01577                   }
01578 
01579                   // Invalidate rendering
01580                   InvalidateWorldRedundency( );
01581 
01582                   // can't be 2 places at once!
01583                   break;
01584             }
01585       }
01586 }
01587

01593 
01594       // no worries if underground
01595       if (gbWorldSectorZ != 0 )
01596       {
01597             return;
01598       }
01599 
01600       for( ubSite = 0; ubSite < NUMBER_OF_REFUEL_SITES; ubSite++ )
01601       {
01602             // is this refueling site sector the loaded sector ?
01603             if ( ( ubRefuelList[ ubSite ][ 0 ] == gWorldSectorX ) && ( ubRefuelList[ ubSite ][ 1 ] == gWorldSectorY ) )
01604             {
01605                   // YES, so find out if the chopper is landed here
01606                   if ( IsHelicopterOnGroundAtRefuelingSite( ubSite ) )

01620                         {
01621                               gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].sSectorX = 0;

01629                               {
01630                                     TacticalRemoveSoldier( pSoldier->ubID );

01640 
01641 
01642 BOOLEAN IsHelicopterOnGroundAtRefuelingSite( UINT8 ubRefuelingSite )
01643 {
01644       if ( fHelicopterDestroyed )
01645       {
01646             return(FALSE);
01647       }
01648 
01649       if ( fHelicopterIsAirBorne )
01650       {
01651             return(FALSE);
01652       }
01653 
01654       // if we haven't even met SkyRider
01655       if ( !fSkyRiderSetUp )
01656       {
01657             // then it's always at Drassen
01658             if ( ubRefuelingSite == DRASSEN_REFUELING_SITE )
01659             {
01660                   return(TRUE);
01661             }
01662             else
01663             {
01664                   return(FALSE);
01665             }
01666       }
01667 
01668       // skyrider is setup, helicopter isn't destroyed, so this ought to be a valid vehicle id
01669       Assert( iHelicopterVehicleId != -1 );
01670 
01671       // on the ground, but is it at this site or at another one?
01672       if ( ( ubRefuelList[ ubRefuelingSite ][ 0 ] == pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX ) && 
01673                    ( ubRefuelList[ ubRefuelingSite ][ 1 ] == pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY ) )
01674       {
01675             return(TRUE);
01676       }
01677 
01678       // not here
01679       return(FALSE);
01680 }
01681 
01682 // drassen airport sector
01683 #define AIRPORT_X 13 
01684 #define AIRPORT_Y 2
01685 
01686 // meduna airport sector
01687 #define AIRPORT2_X 3 
01688 #define AIRPORT2_Y 14
01689 
01690 BOOLEAN WillAirRaidBeStopped( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
01691 {
01692       UINT8 ubSamNumber = 0;
01693       INT8 bSAMCondition;
01694       UINT8 ubChance;
01695 
01696 
01697       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("WillAirRaidBeStopped: enemy air controlled = %d",StrategicMap[CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ].fEnemyAirControlled));
01698       // if enemy controls this SAM site, then it can't stop an air raid
01699       if( StrategicMap[CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ].fEnemyAirControlled == TRUE )
01700       {
01701             return( FALSE );
01702       }
01703 
01704       if( !StrategicMap[ ( AIRPORT_X + ( MAP_WORLD_X * AIRPORT_Y ) ) ].fEnemyControlled && !StrategicMap[ ( AIRPORT2_X + ( MAP_WORLD_X * AIRPORT2_Y ) ) ].fEnemyControlled )
01705       {
01706             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("WillAirRaidBeStopped: enemy has no more airports"));
01707             return( TRUE );
01708       }
01709        
01710 
01711       // which SAM controls this sector?
01712       ubSamNumber = ubSAMControlledSectors[ sSectorX ][ sSectorY ];     
01713 
01714       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("WillAirRaidBeStopped: SAM number = %d",ubSamNumber));
01715       // if none of them
01716       if (ubSamNumber == 0)
01717       {
01718             return( FALSE);
01719       }
01720 
01721       // get the condition of that SAM site (NOTE: SAM #s are 1-4, but indexes are 0-3!!!)
01722       Assert( ubSamNumber <= NUMBER_OF_SAMS );
01723       bSAMCondition = StrategicMap[ SECTOR_INFO_TO_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pSamList[ ubSamNumber - 1 ] ) ].bSAMCondition;
01724 
01725       // if it's too busted to work, then it can't stop an air raid
01726       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("WillAirRaidBeStopped: SAM condition = %d",bSAMCondition));
01727       if( bSAMCondition < MIN_CONDITION_FOR_SAM_SITE_TO_WORK )
01728       {
01729             // no problem, SAM site not working
01730             return( FALSE );
01731       }
01732 
01733 
01734       // Friendly airspace controlled by a working SAM site, so SAM site fires a SAM at air raid bomber
01735 
01736       // calc chance that chopper will be shot down
01737       ubChance = bSAMCondition;
01738 
01739       // there's a fair chance of a miss even if the SAM site is in perfect working order
01740       if (ubChance > MAX_SAM_SITE_ACCURACY * 3) // Madd - since this is only used for enemy air raids, we'll say that good guy SAMs can have a max of 99% to hit instead of 33%
01741       {
01742             ubChance = MAX_SAM_SITE_ACCURACY * 3;
01743       }
01744 
01745       if( PreRandom( 100 ) < ubChance)
01746       {
01747             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("WillAirRaidBeStopped: return true"));
01748             return( TRUE );
01749       }
01750 
01751       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("WillAirRaidBeStopped: return false"));
01752       return( FALSE );
01753 }
01754 
01755 void HeliCrashSoundStopCallback( void *pData )
01756 {
01757       SkyriderDestroyed( );
01758 }
01759 
01760 
01761 BOOLEAN HandleSAMSiteAttackOfHelicopterInSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
01762 {
01763       UINT8 ubSamNumber = 0;
01764       INT8 bSAMCondition;
01765       UINT8 ubChance;
01766 
01767       // if this sector is in friendly airspace, we're safe
01768       if( StrategicMap[CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sSectorX, sSectorY ) ].fEnemyAirControlled == FALSE )
01769       {
01770             // no problem, friendly airspace
01771             return( FALSE );
01772       }
01773 
01774       // which SAM controls this sector?
01775       ubSamNumber = ubSAMControlledSectors[ sSectorX ][ sSectorY ];     
01776 
01777       // if none of them
01778       if (ubSamNumber == 0)
01779       {
01780             return( FALSE);
01781       }
01782 
01783       // get the condition of that SAM site (NOTE: SAM #s are 1-4, but indexes are 0-3!!!)
01784       Assert( ubSamNumber <= NUMBER_OF_SAMS );
01785       bSAMCondition = StrategicMap[ SECTOR_INFO_TO_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pSamList[ ubSamNumber - 1 ] ) ].bSAMCondition;
01786 
01787       // if the SAM site is too damaged to be a threat
01788       if( bSAMCondition < MIN_CONDITION_FOR_SAM_SITE_TO_WORK )
01789       {
01790             // no problem, SAM site not working
01791             return( FALSE );
01792       }
01793 
01794 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01795       if( fSAMSitesDisabledFromAttackingPlayer == TRUE )
01796       {
01797             return( FALSE );
01798       }
01799 #endif
01800       // Hostile airspace controlled by a working SAM site, so SAM site fires a SAM at Skyrider!!!
01801 
01802       // calc chance that chopper will be shot down
01803       ubChance = bSAMCondition;
01804 
01805       // there's a fair chance of a miss even if the SAM site is in perfect working order
01806       if (ubChance > MAX_SAM_SITE_ACCURACY)
01807       {
01808             ubChance = MAX_SAM_SITE_ACCURACY;
01809       }
01810 
01811       if( PreRandom( 100 ) < ubChance)
01812       {
01813             // another hit!
01814             gubHelicopterHitsTaken++;
01815 
01816             // Took a hit!  Pause time so player can reconsider
01817             StopTimeCompression();
01818 
01819             // first hit?
01820             if ( gubHelicopterHitsTaken == 1 )
01821             {
01822                   HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, HELI_TOOK_MINOR_DAMAGE );
01823             }
01824             // second hit?
01825             else if ( gubHelicopterHitsTaken == 2 )
01826             {
01827                   // going back to base (no choice, dialogue says so)
01828                   HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, HELI_TOOK_MAJOR_DAMAGE );
01829                   MakeHeliReturnToBase();
01830             }
01831             // third hit!
01832             else
01833             {
01834                   // Important: Skyrider must still be alive when he talks, so must do this before heli is destroyed!
01835                   HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, HELI_GOING_DOWN );
01836 
01837                   // everyone die die die
01838                   // play sound
01839                   if ( PlayJA2StreamingSampleFromFile( "stsounds\\blah2.wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN, HeliCrashSoundStopCallback ) == SOUND_ERROR )
01840       {
01841         // Destroy here if we cannot play streamed sound sample....
01842                   SkyriderDestroyed( );
01843       }
01844       else
01845       {
01846         // otherwise it's handled in the callback
01847             // remove any arrival events for the helicopter's group
01848             DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup );
01849       }
01850 
01851                   // special return code indicating heli was destroyed
01852                   return( TRUE );
01853             }
01854       }
01855 
01856       // still flying
01857       return( FALSE );
01858 }
01859 
01860 
01861 // are we at the end of the path for the heli?
01862 BOOLEAN EndOfHelicoptersPath( void )
01863 {
01864       if( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath == NULL )
01865       {
01866             return( TRUE );
01867       }
01868 
01869       if( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath->pNext == NULL )
01870       {
01871             return( TRUE );
01872       }
01873 
01874       return( FALSE );
01875 }
01876 
01877 
01878 // check if helicopter can take off?
01879 BOOLEAN CanHelicopterTakeOff( void )
01880 {
01881       INT16 sHelicopterSector = 0;
01882 
01883       // if it's already in the air
01884       if( fHelicopterIsAirBorne == TRUE )
01885       {
01886             return( TRUE ); 
01887       }
01888 
01889       // grab location
01890       sHelicopterSector = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX + pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY * MAP_WORLD_X;
01891       // if it's not in enemy control, we can take off
01892       if( StrategicMap[ sHelicopterSector ].fEnemyControlled == FALSE )
01893       {
01894             return( TRUE );
01895       }
01896 
01897       return( FALSE );
01898 }

01900 void AddHeliPeice( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 sOStruct )
01901 {
01902       UINT16 usDummy;
01903 
01904       // ATE: Check first if already exists....
01905       if ( !TypeExistsInStructLayer( sGridNo, sOStruct, &usDummy ) )
01906       {
01907             // place in the world
01908             AddStructToTail( sGridNo, sOStruct );
01909       }
01910 }

01912 
01913 void AddHelicopterToMaps( BOOLEAN fAdd, UINT8 ubSite )
01914 {
01915       INT16 sGridNo = sRefuelStartGridNo[ ubSite ];
01916       INT16 sOStruct = 0;
01917       INT16 usGridNo;
01918       INT16 sGridX, sGridY;
01919       INT16 sCentreGridX, sCentreGridY;
01920 
01921       // find out what slot it is by which site
01922       if( ubSite == 0 )
01923       {
01924             // drassen
01925             sOStruct = FIRSTOSTRUCT1;
01926       }
01927       else
01928       {
01929             // estoni
01930             sOStruct = FOURTHOSTRUCT1;
01931       }
01932       
01933 
01934       // are we adding or taking away
01935       if( fAdd )
01936       {
01937             AddHeliPeice( sGridNo, sOStruct );
01938             AddHeliPeice( sGridNo, ( UINT16 )( sOStruct + 1));
01939             AddHeliPeice( (INT16)( sGridNo - 800 ), ( UINT16 )( sOStruct + 2 ));
01940             AddHeliPeice( sGridNo, ( UINT16 )(sOStruct + 3 ));
01941             AddHeliPeice( sGridNo, ( UINT16 )(sOStruct + 4));
01942             AddHeliPeice( (INT16)( sGridNo - 800 ), ( UINT16 )(sOStruct + 5));
01943 
01944             InvalidateWorldRedundency();
01945             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01946 
01947     // ATE: If any mercs here, bump them off!
01948       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sCentreGridX, &sCentreGridY );
01949 
01950         for( sGridY = sCentreGridY - 5; sGridY < sCentreGridY + 5; sGridY++ )
01951         {
01952               for( sGridX = sCentreGridX - 5; sGridX < sCentreGridX + 5; sGridX++ )
01953               {
01954                     usGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
01955 
01956                 BumpAnyExistingMerc( usGridNo );
01957       }
01958     }
01959       }
01960       else
01961       {
01962             // remove from the world
01963             RemoveStruct( sRefuelStartGridNo[ ubSite ], ( UINT16 )(sOStruct ));
01964             RemoveStruct( sRefuelStartGridNo[ ubSite ], ( UINT16 )(sOStruct + 1 ));
01965             RemoveStruct( sRefuelStartGridNo[ ubSite ] - 800, ( UINT16 )(sOStruct + 2));
01966             RemoveStruct( sRefuelStartGridNo[ ubSite ], ( UINT16 )(sOStruct + 3));
01967             RemoveStruct( sRefuelStartGridNo[ ubSite ], ( UINT16 )(sOStruct + 4));
01968             RemoveStruct( sRefuelStartGridNo[ ubSite ] - 800, ( UINT16 )(sOStruct +5));
01969 
01970             InvalidateWorldRedundency();
01971             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01972 
01973       }
01974 
01975 }

01977 
01978 BOOLEAN IsSkyriderIsFlyingInSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
01979 {
01980       GROUP *pGroup;
01981 
01982       // up and about?
01983       if ( fHelicopterAvailable && ( iHelicopterVehicleId != -1 ) && CanHelicopterFly() && fHelicopterIsAirBorne )
01984       {
01985             pGroup = GetGroup( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup );
01986 
01987             // the right sector?
01988             if ( ( sSectorX == pGroup->ubSectorX ) && ( sSectorY == pGroup->ubSectorY ) )
01989             {
01990                   return(TRUE);
01991             }
01992       }
01993 
01994       return( FALSE );
01995 }

01999 BOOLEAN IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( GROUP *pGroup )
02000 {
02001       if( ( iHelicopterVehicleId != -1 ) && VehicleIdIsValid( iHelicopterVehicleId ) &&
02002                   ( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup != 0 ) &&
02003                   ( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup == pGroup->ubGroupID ) )
02004       {
02005             return( TRUE );
02006       }
02007 
02008       return( FALSE );
02009 }

02011 
02012 INT16 GetNumSafeSectorsInPath( void )
02013 {
02014       // get the last sector value in the helictoper's path
02015       PathStPtr pNode = NULL;
02016       UINT32 uiLocation = 0;
02017   UINT32  uiCount = 0;
02018       INT32 iHeliSector = -1;
02019       GROUP *pGroup;
02020 
02021       // if the heli is on the move, what is the distance it will move..the length of the merc path, less the first node
02022       if( CanHelicopterFly( ) == FALSE )
02023       {
02024             // big number, no go
02025             return( 0 );
02026       }
02027 
02028 
02029       // may need to skip the sector the chopper is currently in
02030       iHeliSector = CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorX, pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].sSectorY );
02031 
02032       // get chopper's group ptr
02033       pGroup = GetGroup( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup );
02034 
02035       pNode = pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath;
02036 
02037       // any path yet?
02038       if( pNode != NULL )
02039       {
02040             // first node: skip it if that's the sector the chopper is currently in, AND
02041             // we're NOT gonna be changing directions (not actually performed until waypoints are rebuilt AFTER plotting is done)
02042             if ( ( ( INT32 ) pNode->uiSectorId == iHeliSector ) && ( pNode->pNext != NULL ) &&
02043                         !GroupBetweenSectorsAndSectorXYIsInDifferentDirection( pGroup, ( UINT8 ) GET_X_FROM_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pNode->pNext->uiSectorId ), ( UINT8 ) GET_Y_FROM_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pNode->pNext->uiSectorId ) ) )
02044             {
02045                   pNode = pNode->pNext;
02046             }
02047 
02048             while( pNode)
02049             {
02050                   uiLocation = pNode -> uiSectorId;
02051 
02052       if ( !StrategicMap[ uiLocation ].fEnemyAirControlled )
02053       {
02054         uiCount++;
02055       }
02056 
02057                   pNode = pNode ->pNext;
02058             }
02059       }
02060 
02061 
02062   pNode = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( pTempHelicopterPath );
02063       // any path yet?
02064       if( pNode != NULL )
02065       {
02066             // first node: skip it if that's the sector the chopper is currently in, AND
02067             // we're NOT gonna be changing directions (not actually performed until waypoints are rebuilt AFTER plotting is done)
02068             // OR if the chopper has a mercpath, in which case this a continuation of it that would count the sector twice
02069             if ( ( ( ( INT32 ) pNode->uiSectorId == iHeliSector ) && ( pNode->pNext != NULL ) &&
02070                         !GroupBetweenSectorsAndSectorXYIsInDifferentDirection( pGroup, ( UINT8 ) GET_X_FROM_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pNode->pNext->uiSectorId ), ( UINT8 ) GET_Y_FROM_STRATEGIC_INDEX( pNode->pNext->uiSectorId ) ) ) ||
02071                          ( GetLengthOfPath( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath ) > 0 ) )
02072             {
02073                   pNode = pNode->pNext;
02074             }
02075 
02076             while( pNode)
02077             {
02078                   uiLocation = pNode -> uiSectorId;
02079 
02080       if ( !StrategicMap[ uiLocation ].fEnemyAirControlled )
02081       {
02082         uiCount++;
02083       }
02084 
02085                   pNode = pNode ->pNext;
02086             }
02087       }
02088 
02089       return( (INT16)uiCount );
02090 }
02091

02174 
02175 void PaySkyriderBill( void)
02176 {
02177       // if we owe anything for the trip
02178       if ( iTotalAccumulatedCostByPlayer > 0 )
02179       {
02180             // if player can afford to pay the Skyrider bill
02181             if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance >= iTotalAccumulatedCostByPlayer )
02182             {
02183                   // no problem, pay the man
02184                   // add the transaction
02185                   AddTransactionToPlayersBook( PAYMENT_TO_NPC, SKYRIDER, GetWorldTotalMin( ), -iTotalAccumulatedCostByPlayer );
02186                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, pSkyriderText[ 0 ], iTotalAccumulatedCostByPlayer );
02187             }
02188             else
02189             {
02190                   // money owed
02191                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance > 0 )
02192                   {
02193                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, pSkyriderText[ 0 ], LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance );
02194                         gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].iBalance = LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance - iTotalAccumulatedCostByPlayer;
02195                         // add the transaction
02196                         AddTransactionToPlayersBook( PAYMENT_TO_NPC, SKYRIDER, GetWorldTotalMin( ), -LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance );
02197                   }
02198                   else
02199                   {
02200                         gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].iBalance = - iTotalAccumulatedCostByPlayer;
02201                   }
02202 
02203                   HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, OWED_MONEY_TO_SKYRIDER );
02204                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, pSkyriderText[ 1 ], -gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].iBalance );
02205 
02206                   // kick everyone out! (we know we're in a safe sector if we're paying)
02207                   MoveAllInHelicopterToFootMovementGroup( );
02208 
02209                   MakeHeliReturnToBase();
02210             }
02211 
02212             iTotalAccumulatedCostByPlayer = 0;
02213       }
02214 }
02215 
02216 
02217 void PayOffSkyriderDebtIfAny( )
02218 {
02219       INT32 iAmountOwed;
02220       INT32 iPayAmount;
02221 
02222 
02223       iAmountOwed = - gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].iBalance;
02224 
02225       // if we owe him anything, and have any money
02226       if ( ( iAmountOwed > 0 ) && ( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance > 0 ) )
02227       {
02228             iPayAmount = min( iAmountOwed, LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance );
02229 
02230             // pay the man what we can
02231             gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].iBalance += iPayAmount;
02232             // add the transaction
02233             AddTransactionToPlayersBook( PAYMENT_TO_NPC, SKYRIDER, GetWorldTotalMin( ), -iPayAmount );
02234             // tell player
02235             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, pSkyriderText[ 0 ], iPayAmount );
02236 
02237             // now whaddawe owe?
02238             iAmountOwed = - gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].iBalance;
02239 
02240             // if it wasn't enough
02241             if ( iAmountOwed > 0 )
02242             {
02243                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, pSkyriderText[ 1 ], iAmountOwed );
02244                   HeliCharacterDialogue( pSkyRider, OWED_MONEY_TO_SKYRIDER );
02245             }
02246       }
02247 }

02250 
02251 void MakeHeliReturnToBase( void )
02252 {
02253       INT32 iLocation = 0;
02254 
02255 
02256       // if already at a refueling point
02257       if ( CheckForArrivalAtRefuelPoint() )
02258       {
02259             ReFuelHelicopter( );
02260       }
02261       else
02262       {
02263             // choose destination (closest refueling sector)
02264             iLocation = LocationOfNearestRefuelPoint( TRUE );
02265 
02266             // null out path
02267             pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath = ClearStrategicPathList( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath, pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup );
02268 
02269             // plot path to that sector
02270             pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath = AppendStrategicPath( MoveToBeginningOfPathList( BuildAStrategicPath( NULL, GetLastSectorIdInVehiclePath( iHelicopterVehicleId ) , ( INT16 )( CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( ubRefuelList[ iLocation ][ 0 ], ubRefuelList[ iLocation ][ 1 ] ) ) , pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup, FALSE /*, FALSE */ ) ), pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath );
02271             pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath ); 
02272 
02273             // rebuild the movement waypoints
02274             RebuildWayPointsForGroupPath( pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].pMercPath, pVehicleList[ iHelicopterVehicleId ].ubMovementGroup );
02275 
02276             fHeliReturnStraightToBase = TRUE;
02277             fHoveringHelicopter = FALSE;
02278       }
02279 
02280       // stop time compression if it's on so player can digest this
02281       StopTimeCompression( );
02282 }

02285 
02286 BOOLEAN SoldierAboardAirborneHeli( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
02287 {
02288       Assert( pSoldier );
02289 
02290       // if not in a vehicle, or not aboard the helicopter
02291       if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) || ( pSoldier->iVehicleId != iHelicopterVehicleId ) )
02292       {
02293             return( FALSE );
02294       }
02295 
02296       // he's in the heli - is it airborne?
02297       if ( !fHelicopterIsAirBorne )
02298       {
02299             // nope, it's currently on the ground
02300             return( FALSE );
02301       }
02302 
02303       // yes, airborne
02304       return( TRUE );
02305 }
